thread.title: People Unite to Correct You About Hoverboards
thread.title_full: People Unite to Correct You About Hoverboards -- The Cut

author: Jessica Roy
title: People Unite to Correct You About Hoverboards
text:
"THIS is a hoverboard." Photo: Universal Studios
After decades of mounting apathy, people of all backgrounds have finally found a unifying cause to rally around: telling you if something is or is not a hoverboard .
Next time I see someone riding a "hoverboard" I'm going to look at them and say, "That's not a hoverboard."
— Josh Friday (@JoshuaJFriday) October 13, 2015 THAT'S NOT A HOVERBOARD! IT DOESN'T HOVER!" - me, shouting at cool teenagers
— Logan Rhoades (@LoganRhoades) October 12, 2015 That thing you can't use is not a hoverboard. https://t.co/ls8ghgBAWr
— southpaw (@nycsouthpaw) October 12, 2015 Dear press. By definition it is not a "hoverboard" unless it hovers. A segway has wheels. Do cars hover? Do bikes? No.
That is all.
— Emily McCulloch (@emmyloumac) October 13, 2015 Your stupid handleless Segway is not a “hoverboard” unless IT FLOATS ABOVE THE GROUND.
— Andrew Huster (@ahuster) October 12, 2015 If it has 2 wheels, its not a hoverboard.
— Chaz Russo (@chazrusso) October 12, 2015 If it doesn't float it's not a hoverboard.
— Victoria M. Walker (@VikkieNotVicky) October 13, 2015 it's not a hoverboard. it's not hovering. it has wheels. don't call it a hoverboard. thanks. pic.twitter.com/BTz98DQOB4
— Sebastian Parks (@sebastianjparks) October 11, 2015 If it doesn’t float above the ground
it’s not a hoverboard
thank you for your attention
— Jared Keller (@jaredbkeller) October 7, 2015 THATS NOT A HOVERBOARD https://t.co/e1n3mMGNnM
— Jay (@bugJ) October 3, 2015 IT'S NOT A HOVERBOARD STOP CALLING IT A HOVERBOARD! YOU CAN SEE THE WHEELS, PEOPLE! pic.twitter.com/6odCkMn5yM
— Anna (@thatswedishgirl) October 12, 2015 If it has wheels, it's not a "Hoverboard".
— Brent D. Butcher (@GO_ILL84) September 29, 2015 THIS is NOT a #hoverboard . It's a miniature segue. #TheMoreYouKnow http://t.co/U2g04LIcO4 pic.twitter.com/PPWvPenNRS
— David Staley (@staleydavid) September 29, 2015 America, the world: This is NOT a hoverboard: pic.twitter.com/cSgv4gTtmw
— Guy Fantastico (@GuyFantastico) September 28, 2015 Who's going to break the news to Bieber ?
